fields.headline: Uefa Cup draw,  group stages
fields.bodyText: Group stages Feyenoord Schalke 04 Basle Hearts Ferencvaros Fixtures Oct 21 Feyenoord v Hearts, Schalke v Basle. Nov 4 Hearts v Schalke, Ferencvaros v Feyenoord. Nov 25 Basle v Hearts, Schalke v Ferencvaros. Dec 1 Ferencvaros v Basle, Feyenoord v Schalke. Dec 15 Basle v Feyenoord, Hearts v Ferencvaros. Sporting Lisbon Sochaux Panionios Dinamo Tbilisi Fixtures Oct 21 Panionios v Newcastle, Dinamo Tbilisi v Sochaux. Nov 4 Newcastle v Tbilisi, Sporting Lisbon v Panionios. Nov 25 Sochaux v Newcastle, Tbilisi v Sporting. Dec 1 Sporting v Sochaux. Dec 2 Panionios v Tbilisi. Dec 15 Sochaux v Panionios, Newcastle v Sporting. Lazio Villarreal Middlesbrough Partizan Belgrade Egaleo Fixtures Oct 21 Egaleo v Middlesbro, Lazio v Villarreal. Nov 4 Middlesbro v Lazio, Partizan Belgrade v Egaleo. Nov 25 Villarreal v Middlesbro, Lazio v Partizan Belgrade. Dec 1 Partizan Belgrade v Villarreal, Egaleo v Lazio. Dec 15 Villarreal v Egaleo, Middlesbro v Partizan Belgrade Rangers Auxerre Grazer AK Amica Wronki AZ Alkmaar Fixtures Oct 21 Auxerre v Grazer AK, Amica Wronki v Rangers. Nov 4 Grazer AK v Amica Wronki, AZ Alkmaar v Auxerre Nov 25 Rangers v Grazer AK, Amica Wronki v AZ Alkmaar. Dec 1 AZ Alkmaar v Rangers, Auxerre v Amica Wronki. Dec 15 Rangers v Auxerre. Dec 16 Grazer AK v AZ Alkmaar Forty teams progressed from the first round to the inaugural group stage. The new format comprises eight groups of five teams. Each team plays two matches at home and two away, meaning that they will face every other team once only. First three teams in each group advance to the two-leg knockout stage, along with the eight third-placed teams from the Champions League. Group B Parma, Besiktas, Athletic Bilbao, Steaua Bucharest, Standard Liège. Group C Club Bruges, Real Zaragoza, Utrecht, Dnipro Dnipropetrovsk, Austria Vienna. Group G VfB Stuttgart, Benfica, Dinamo Zagreb, Heerenveen, Beveren. Group H AEK Athens, Lille, Sevilla, Alemannia Aachen, Zenit St Petersburg.
